sentences.sCn: 你是怎样为自己定位的？

sentences.sContent: When in cursor-positioning mode, the user can tab to, or position the cursor on, any character in the input field.
sentences.sContent_eng: When in cursor-positioning mode, the user can tab to, or position the cursor on, any character in the input field.
sentences.sCn: 当您处于游标定位模式时，用户可以切换，或者定位游标到输入区域的任何一个字符之上。

sentences.sContent: However it seems clear that the major players are aware of this opportunity and are positioning their services to capture it.
sentences.sContent_eng: However it seems clear that the major players are aware of this opportunity and are positioning their services to capture it.
sentences.sCn: 然而主要的竞争参与者似乎已经明显地意识到这个机会，正在定位它们的服务来抓住这个机会。

phrases.pCn: 位控制；定位控制；位置控制

words.tran: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置

trans.tranCn: [计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置
